name: Dungeon Synth
description: Focuses on evoking epic and atmospheric soundscapes primarily associated with fantasy and medieval settings through the usage of synthesizers, keyboards, lo-fi production, and drum machines.

children.name: Comfy Synth
children.description: Calm, peaceful and soothing sounds, as well as nostalgic, sentimental, or childish atmospheres and aesthetics; often incorporates wholesome themes while utilizing lo-fi or hazy recordings and influences from New Age.

children.name: Winter Synth
children.description: Cold, minimalistic, and repetitive soundscapes, commonly invoking imagery of winter.
